name: NeoCyber Kyoto's Cyber Ships
description:
NeoCyber Kyoto Cyber Ships is a snafu (snakes) like game with an asteroid twist.

NeoCyber Kyoto's Cyber Ships 

Its the year 2119 and a singularity has destroyed NeoKyoto. In its wake the citizens have rebuilt NeoCyber Kyoto. 

Raven the cybernetic bunny (from The Forest) has stolen a craft and is being chased by one of the experiments from the Forest just outside of NeoCyber Kyoto! Help him survive.

Features:

* 2 player mode only 

* Cyberpunk snake like game 

* With an asteroid twist

* Original music

This mini game is designed to generate the best of 80's cyberpunk synth-wave nostalgia. 

Music and SFX (C) 2019 Matrix.

(Note, there is no 1 player mode)

Also see our game The Forest. Available on itch.io, iOS, and Android.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Illusion12xGames.TheForest

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-forest-scifi-shooter-game/id1452692735
